当时买的时候是朋友给我推的，但是后来玩的时候，在从墙进去然后从天花板or地板出来的时候头晕的超级厉害（甚至看我朋友那么做都会头晕），最后他看不下去了说你还是退了吧，这游戏可能不太适合你。然后我就退了。
但是抛开这一点不谈，还是挺好玩的。怎么说呢，解谜的过程挺有意思的，有那么一点的耗脑子，但是不至于说难度非常大（至少我玩到的那几关是这样，后面我确实不知道）。所以还是给个推荐，毕竟做的确实挺不错的。

Portal foi um teste para o seu sucessor (Portal 2)
Mas foi muito além do que era esperado... Revolucionou os jogos de puzzles, com toda certeza. Startou uma das melhores épocas pra quem gosta de jogo desse tipo. Aqui tudo é muito bom e feito com muito amor pelos desenvolvedores, o trabalho que aqui foi feito eu não vejo em outros games da empresa.
Além disso, a sensação que o jogo passa e o plot são experiencias únicas que eu queria poder sentir novamente
E se você curte fazer speedruns, esse é o jogo pra VOCÊ. Eu como runner, foi oque eu sempre procurei. Aqui speedruns são genuinamente divertidas.
9.2/10
Great story. It's shorter by a lot compared to Portal 2, but for the $1.99 sale price, it's worth it. I definitely recommend this game and the sequel. Anyone who is a fan of puzzles will enjoy.
This game is a classic you just must play.

It's a good little puzzle game from what I experienced. I would probably say a 6/10 for the main game. Mainly because it's honestly pretty short and can easily be beaten within 45 minutes to 2 hours. Not really much a general story, but good foreshadowing with good quips now and then. GLaDoS is fantastic as a villain from just being a robot whose goal is to make a tester out of you.

I still recommend getting the Bundle if you've never experienced Portal or Portal 2 as you can save money alongside getting more for the value. Going to try out the challenge stages to see how much more I can get from Portal before calling it there.
It's fun and I'm obsessed with it

me gusto mucho

I can't believe I hadn't played this game until now, it's such a well designed and amazingly written game! The puzzles escalate in really natural and fun ways, and they're all a blast to solve one by one. The Half-Life style environmental storytelling is great, and GLaDos is such an awesome villain! My only complaint is that the game is too short (about 3-4 hours) and physics can be slightly finicky at points, but honestly, the whole package is so good and the physics issue comes up so rarely that it doesn't bother me, fantastic game

Portal is the game that changes the idea of the first person shooter genre with you not shooting bullets, but interdimensional wormholes through space and time. This game provided me with a unique experience, good humor, and just the right surreal element. The story was a bit simple, as it was a last minute edition, but i believe the gameplay experience made up for that
Super fun and interesting game, a must have

this is an excellent game with amazingly designed puzzles that while incredibly easy make you feel accomplished and continue to introduce fresh ideas throughout the game. but that's not the exact reason that i enjoyed this game, to me the jokes always landed, but my favorite part of the game is the story it while would be a good story normally it is not spoon-fed to the player and it builds itself around the player as you progress in the game by discovering the things that are happening beneath the surface in aperture science. in conclusion this game is well made and a good example of valves capability to captivate players.
